newsitem.title: JAPAN: Canadian issuers to launch yen/A$ samurais - sources.
newsitem.headline: Canadian issuers to launch yen/A$ samurais - sources.

text.p: Two Canadian borrowers are expected to launch fresh issues of yen/Australian dollar dual-currency samurai bonds soon, underwriting sources said on Tuesday.

Ontario Hydro is likely to launch a three-year bond, with Yamaichi Securities lead managing the issue, the sources said. They added that the amount of the issue is expected to be 50 billion yen although it has not been decided yet.
It may be launched as early as today, they added.
In addition, the sources said the province of Alberta is also mulling a three-year yen/Aussie dual samurai, with Nikko Securities acting as the lead manager.
The issue amount is likely to be around 30 billion yen, but neither that nor the launch date have been finalised, the sources said. -- Tokyo Treasury Desk (81-3-5473-3710)
